title: Silver Pickaxe
summaries: The Silver Pickaxe is an early-game pickaxe that is stronger than the Iron and Lead Pickaxes, but weaker than the Gold and Platinum Pickaxes. Compared to its alternate ore version, the Tungsten Pickaxe, it has less pickaxe power but is significantly faster in terms of mining speed. Unlike the Tungsten Pickaxe, it is not able to mine Meteorite.
Its best modifier is Light for harvesting purposes and Legendary for combat purposes.
